effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.sun_moon: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.
